00039 #ifndef TRANSFORM_H_
00040 #define TRANSFORM_H_
00041 
00042 #include <iostream>
00043 
00044 #include "Matrix4x4.h"
00045 #include "Ptr.h"
00046 
00047 struct Point3D;
00048 struct Vector3D;
00049 struct NormalVector;
00050 struct Ray;
00051 struct BBox;
00052 
00053 class Transform
00054 {
00055 public:
00056         Transform( );
00057         Transform( double mat[4][4] );
00058         Transform( const Ptr<Matrix4x4>& mdir );
00059         Transform( const Ptr<Matrix4x4>& mdir,  const Ptr<Matrix4x4>& minv );
00060         Transform( double t00, double t01, double t02, double t03,
00061                double t10, double t11, double t12, double t13,
00062                    double t20, double t21, double t22, double t23,
00063                    double t30, double t31, double t32, double t33 );
00064         Transform( const Transform& rhs );
00065 
00066         Transform Transpose() const;
00067         Transform GetInverse() const ;
00068         Point3D operator()( const Point3D& point ) const;
00069         void operator()( const Point3D& point, Point3D* transformedPoint ) const;
00070         Vector3D operator()( const Vector3D& vector ) const;
00071         void operator()( const Vector3D& vector, Vector3D* transformedVector ) const;
00072         NormalVector operator()( const NormalVector& normal ) const;
00073         void operator()( const NormalVector& normal, NormalVector* transformedNormal ) const;
00074         Ray operator()( const Ray& ray ) const;
00075         void operator()( const Ray& ray, Ray* transformedRay ) const;
00076         BBox operator()( const BBox& bbox  ) const;
00077         void operator()( const BBox& bbox, BBox* transformedBbox  ) const;
00078         Transform operator*( const Transform& rhs ) const;
00079         bool SwapsHandedness( ) const;
00080 
00081         bool operator==( const Transform& mat ) const;
00082 
00083         Ptr<Matrix4x4> GetMatrix() const {return m_mdir;}
00084 
00085         friend std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream& os, const Transform& tran );
00086 
00087 private:
00088         Ptr<Matrix4x4> m_mdir;
00089         Ptr<Matrix4x4> m_minv;
00090 };
